lore: The only vulnerable parts of a Spirit are its hands and face, as steel and magic simply go through its body.\n\nIf an Exalted Spirit finds someone living in poverty, it always offers food and other presents to help them in their situation. Unfortunately, they sometimes steal these gifts from other people, which often gives the story a sad and violent ending.
menagerieDialog: (Something about this creature's presence is particularly comforting.)
(Spirits are not known for their love of violence, but this one appears to be an exception.)
(While Spirits are typically a joy to be around thanks to their friendly nature, this one is especially ingratiating due to its keen intellect.)
(It's very quick to make friends with your other creatures. Such camaraderie will be useful in battle.)
(It appears to be in a fantastic mood, as usual. You only wish that you could have such a light attitude sometimes.)
name: Exalted Spirit
